post.author: gavlig
post.body:
Hey guys!
I have the same error this guys have. But as far as Kats' forum is closed I can't complain there

So after I try to export some simple mesh i get this:

Quote:
....
There is a vertex without attachment to a bone in mesh: Cube
There is a vertex without attachment to a bone in mesh: Cube
There is a vertex without attachment to a bone in mesh: Cube
created verts at A 94, B 222, C 0

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/gavlig/.blender/2.60/scripts/addons/io_export_md5.py", line 849, in execute
save_md5(settings)
File "/home/gavlig/.blender/2.60/scripts/addons/io_export_md5.py", line 713, in save_md5
arm_action = thearmature.animation_data.action
AttributeError: 'int' object has no attribute 'animation_data'

location:<unknown location>:-1


I haven't actually attached any bone to the mesh, but is it necessary?

Thanks in advance!

post.author: gavlig
post.body: guys? anybody alive here?

post.author: tea monster
post.body: I've just started messing around with Doom 3 after making the jump from sector-based games. I'm a Blender user.
